plot: In the fall of 1979, a family from India came to America. There were barbecues and Halloween and hunting. But most importantly, there was the inexplicable joy of first-love. And no one ever forgets a first-love.   Written by  AN
title: Good Ol' Boy
plot_es: In the fall of 1979, a family from India came to America. There were barbecues and Halloween and hunting. But most importantly, there was the inexplicable joy of first-love. And no one ever forgets a first-love.   Written by  AN
